_comments.motion_sensitivity: Lower values = more sensitive motion detection (1-100)
_comments.motion_min_area: Minimum pixel area to trigger motion detection
_comments.motion_cooldown: Seconds between motion detections to avoid spam
_comments.save_all_detections: Save all motion events, even without target objects
_comments.log_level: Logging level: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR
_comments.show_live_stats: Show live statistics after each detection
_comments.stats_interval: Show periodic stats every N seconds (0 = disabled)
